code: import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{connect}from'react-redux';import{deleteComment}from'../../actions/post';import formatDate from'../../utils/formatDate';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CommentItem=_ref=>{let{postId,comment:{_id,text,name,avatar,user,date},auth,deleteComment}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{class:"post bg-white p-1 my-1",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/profile/".concat(user),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{class:"round-img",src:avatar,alt:"Github DP instead of Gravatar",onerror:"imgError(this)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:name})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{class:"my-1",children:text}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"post-date",children:["Posted on ",formatDate(date)]}),!auth.loading&&user===auth.user._id&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:e=>deleteComment(postId,_id),type:"button",className:"btn btn-danger",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-times"})})]})]});};const mapStateToProps=state=>({auth:state.auth});export default connect(mapStateToProps,{deleteComment})(CommentItem);
